extendedInfo.description: Never get stuck without dice again!  Useful for anyone that plays games that need dice!  From two six sided dice needed for a quick Backgammon game to a handful of twenty sided dice used in an all-day war game, Dice Box Deluxe has you covered, *** Updated to work with all phones and tablets!!! ***Dice Box Deluxe II is the latest version of Dice Box from Code4Mobile.  Using an all new architecture, Dice Box Deluxe II runs on all Android phones and tablets.  Roll up to ten of any assortment of polyhedral dice.  Choose from four sided (d4), six sided (d6), eight sided (d8), ten sided (d10), twelve sided (d12), or twenty sided (d20) dice and roll them with a touch of a button. For less than the cost a single high quality die, you get:â Photo quality dice with user selected colors of Red, Orange, Yellow, Green, Blue, Indigo and Violet.â Roll up to Ten Dice at a time, with total including modifier.â Cryptographic quality random number generation.â Choose any combination of polyhedral dice, and save the roll configuration as a preset!â Add modifiers to your rolls, going positive or negative, from +99 to -99.â  Includes Any-sided die feature that goes up to 9999, and includes the ability to save any-sided die presets!â Works on just about any phone or tablet, and on all Android versions.In addition, many useful features are included such as the ability to lock specific dice and re-roll the unlocked dice, as well as displaying history of past rolls, an easy to manage preset system, and much more.Dice Box Deluxe is the only dice app you will ever need for all of your gaming and dice inclusive activities.

reviews.title: Amazing!!!
reviews.comment: They fixed it! It took awhile but it was done in the end! Thank you developers! You heard our cries! 5 stars this is like the best dice app I\'ve ever seen by far. So many neat tweaks and features. Get it!!!
reviews.author: Chris Zimmerman

reviews.title: Everything I wanted in a dice app!
reviews.comment: Love this app. The custom dice, the roll history, everything about this app is perfect for someone with a dice addiction!!!
reviews.author: Beamer Pickert

reviews.title: Forced payment
reviews.comment: I\'ve used this as a free app forever. Now they don\'t offer the free app so I\'m pretty much forced to buy this since there\'s not another dice app on android that even comes close to what I need. Love the app but really mad that the money grubbing devas took the free version off the market.
reviews.author: Aaron Whittington

reviews.title: Tok almost a year, but ICS finally supported!!
reviews.comment: Finally it displays properly!!  I can use it for Storytelling LARP again!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: EDIT: Fixed, works great! (Cut off in ICS)
reviews.comment: Edit: The developer has fixed the cut off issue and it\'s back to working great on my tablet.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Back from the dead!
reviews.comment: Finally fixed and works great!  Thank you!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: It\'s ALIVE!!!
reviews.comment: Hey it works now! YAY!!
reviews.author: Weston Dodge

reviews.title: Great but...
reviews.comment: I love this app, used it for ages. When I got my S3 I was very sad to see that it\'s not displaying right at all. Needs an update.
reviews.author: Peter Brittain

reviews.title: Doesn\'t play with ICS
reviews.comment: Worked great with my Droid X. After upgrading to a Galaxy Nexus, the screen layout is cut off and screen won\'t update after tapping Roll.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Does not display on galaxy nexus
reviews.comment: Worked awesome on my EVO...but on my ICS Galaxy Nexus the screen is cut off and dice won\'t roll.  Awesome app except that I can\'t use it anymore :( please update if able?
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awful black border
reviews.comment: Black border makes app practically unusable.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Need Samsung S4 Support
reviews.comment: Is not compatible with the Samsung S4. Application does not properly display making it difficult/imposdible to use with this model.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Doesn\'t work on nexus
reviews.comment: Doesn\'t work on galaxy nexus,   developer doesn\'t respond to emails
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Very Good
reviews.comment: Looks great. Some aspects are a bit clumsy but this is a top dice roller. I use for sport sims that require custom rolls & this does the job.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: If there were some way to have one die roll subtracted from another rather than only adding them (to work with alternity) this would be perfect
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Nice looking. Powerful. But not quick to use when editing dice. Can\'t add modifiers to each dice seperately. DiceBag is much easier/faster to use
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: I love this app. It would be nice, however, if you could drop dice for rolling stats.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: It\'s good. Graphical UI is neat. Needs ability to mod rolls, individually and combo rolls.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Very handy little app for all us games. The interface could be a bit better designed
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Was great, fc on open
reviews.author: A Google User
